EmailTemplate.description: Includes 3 Month survey link in SG3 without any reference to the 6 wk report if there was no responses to the Application survey.
EmailTemplate.name: 05 3 month Invite - No ref to Application Report
EmailTemplate.subject: ENSI Final Survey - Negotiation Impact & Value from {!Contact.Job_Certificate_Date__c} Program
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName}
As a final request, we would appreciate 5 minutes of your time to share with us and your {!Contact.Job_Account_Name__c} colleagues the impact and value you have seen since your ENS workshop on {!Contact.Job_Certificate_Date__c}
Please click here to access the survey. http://www.surveygizmo.com/s3/1120229/3-MONTH-POST-PROGRAM-SURVEY?jid={!Contact.Last_Job_ID__c}&pid={!Contact.Last_Participant_Id__c} The survey link is specific to you, please don't forward to others.
We would appreciate if you could complete the survey by: {!Contact.Job_3_month_case_study_due__c}.
Thank you in advance for your cooperation. If you have any questions or comments, please don't hesitate to contact me directly.
Kind regards
{!Contact.Job_CSM_Name__c} Client Service Manager
Suite 507, 83 York Street Sydney NSW 2000 Australia p: +61 9299 9688 f: +61 9299 1633 www.negotiate.org
Note this email and any attachments may be privileged and confidential. If you are not the intended recipient please delete the message and notify the sender. Copying or distribution by anyone else is prohibited. Thank you.
